law.catch_line: Privileges and immunities of paramedics and first responders.
law.text: A paramedic licensed pursuant to this chapter and a first responder certified pursuant to this chapter shall have the privileges and immunities specified in KRS 411.148, subject to the provisions of that statute.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 27, effective July 15, 2002.
